name: Decay (Keith Swanger)
description:
Tips
  • Use WASD to move
  • Visit two places each day before returning home
  • Stick to the roads to find places
  • If you get lost, head to the bottom left, you’ll find your home there

Debt

Depression

Disease

Distress

Decay

At least one is inevitable

Decay is a life simulator where you attempt to juggle many facets of life while falling deeper and deeper into despair
